item.title: Gina add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Gina add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jess C. Scott
item.description: "When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth." -- Jess C. Scott

item.title: Gina add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "The most wasted of all days is one without laughter." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I hope that one day you will have the experience of doing something you do not understand for someone you love." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "When I looked at you, my life made sense. Even the bad things made sense. They were necessary to make you possible." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by jonathan safran foer
item.description: "Time was passing like a hand waving from a train I wanted to be on. I hope you never have to think about anything as much as I think about you." -- jonathan safran foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "You can't love anything more than something you miss." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "He promised us that everything would be okay. I was a child, but I knew that everything would not be okay. That did not make my father a liar. It made him my father." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "It's hard to remember that this day will never come again. That the time is now and the place is here and that there are no second chances at a single moment." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Try to live so that you can always tell the truth." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Gina add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Gina add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "Many waters cannot quench love, neither can floods drown it. What then kills love? Only this: Neglect. Not to see you when you stand before me. Not to think of you in the little things. Not to make the road wide for you, the table spread for you. To choose you out of habit not desire, to pass the flower seller without a thought. To leave the dishes unwashed, the bed unmade, to ignore you in the mornings, make use of you at night. To crave another while pecking your cheek. To say your name without hearing it, to assume it is mine to call." -- Jeanette Winterson
